column1: Smoque BBQ////I have been to Smoque at least a dozen times. I almost always get the brisket platter with beans and fries. I am not a big fan of the cornbread or cobbler. The coleslaw helps cool my stomach. The food is great. The ribs are of a different style and if you know it
column2: then it is good. If you compare it to the drenched in sauce variety we mostly get here in Chitown
